holidays.title: Global Beatles Day
holidays.description: The occasion pays tribute to "The Beatles" and their impact on both music and pop culture.

holidays.title: International Day of the Seafarer
holidays.description: From Coast Guards, to Navies, to every fisherman and marine biologist and cruise ship captain.

holidays.title: Backyard Safety Check Day
holidays.description: An annual reminder to inspect outdoor spaces for hazards and create safer family environments.

holidays.title: Croatia Independence Day
holidays.description: Let's get ready to celebrate and learn about Croatian independence!

holidays.title: Goats Cheese Day
holidays.description: Tangy, sour, tart, acidic, salty, earthy — these are the flavors that make goats' cheese so distinctive.

holidays.title: Islamic New Year
holidays.description: Islamic New Year is the first day of Muharram, the first month in the Islamic calendar.

holidays.title: Mozambique Independence Day
holidays.description: Let us get ready to celebrate Mozambique's rich culture and heritage by joining in the festivities!

holidays.title: National Camp Counts Day
holidays.description: National Camp Counts Day is here to reinforce that camp is cool, fun, and important.

holidays.title: National Catfish Day
holidays.description: Swim in the goodness of catfish whilst educating yourself and others about its wonders.

holidays.title: National Croatian Wine Day
holidays.description: There's no better time to learn about Croatian wine than on National Croatian Wine Day!

holidays.title: National Day of Joy
holidays.description: Look within and around you — what makes you happy might just be an inch away.

holidays.title: National Leon Day
holidays.description: Enjoy your Christmas treats and ugly Christmas sweaters for the heck of it on June 25.

holidays.title: National Olaplex Day
holidays.description: Let your hair down and show off your crown of locks as we celebrate Olaplex Day.

holidays.title: National Parchment Day
holidays.description: Bring innovation and convenience back to the kitchen with parchment paper!

holidays.title: National Strawberry Parfait Day
holidays.description: During the summer days, we welcome the cold and delicious strawberry parfait into our lives.

holidays.title: Please Take My Children to Work Day
holidays.description: A day when stay-at-home parents can ask their partners or friends to take their children to work.

holidays.title: Reserves Day
holidays.description: Let all your activities today show your gratitude to the Reservist arm of the military.

holidays.title: Statehood Day
holidays.description: On this Statehood Day, let’s celebrate Slovenia’s declaration of independence and honor their history.

holidays.title: The Day of the Filipino Seafarer
holidays.description: Get ready to enter and learn about the strenuous world of seafarers.

holidays.title: World Vitiligo Day
holidays.description: Learn more about vitiligo and how to support those who are affected by this condition.

holidays.title: Anthony Bourdain’s Birthday
holidays.description: A brilliant author and travel documentarian, this renowned chef’s legacy will forever endure.

holidays.title: Eric Carle’s Birthday
holidays.description: His love of nature made up his happiest memories, inspiring him to write and illustrate books.

holidays.title: George Michael’s Birthday
holidays.description: Known as the best-selling music artist of his time, the legendary artist’s music lives on.

holidays.title: Kylie Cantrall’s Birthday
holidays.description: This young star is on the right path to making a name for herself in Hollywood.

holidays.title: La La Anthony’s Birthday
holidays.description: From radio host to television star, author, and entrepreneur, she’s independently built her empire.

holidays.title: Madison Reyes’s Birthday
holidays.description: With her growing speed, Reyes will undoubtedly be a force to be reckoned with.

holidays.title: Mckenna Grace’s Birthday
holidays.description: For this young movie star, the world is her oyster and she’s just getting started.
